name: Dino Destruction (Skill Card)
text:
Rex / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase. Once per turn, you can choose 1 Level 6 or higher Dinosaur monster you control. This turn, if it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage. Flip this card over at the end of the turn you activated this Skill.
